title: How to Make White Chocolate Butterscotch Chip Cookies

steps.headline: Add flour, baking soda and salt to a mixing bowl.
Add butter and brown sugar to another mixing bowl.
Add the flour mixture slowly to the brown sugar mixture.
Add butterscotch and vanilla pieces and stir into batter.
Drop by teaspoonfuls on to ungreased cookie sheets.
Cool cookies on wire baking racks.

text: Add flour, baking soda and salt to a mixing bowl. Stir well. Add butter and brown sugar to another mixing bowl. Cream together the ingredients. Add the flour mixture slowly to the brown sugar mixture. Mix well. Add butterscotch and vanilla pieces and stir into batter.  Drop by teaspoonfuls on to ungreased cookie sheets.  Bake at 300 °F (149 °C) for 18 to 20 minutes.  Cool cookies on wire baking racks.
